name: Spookity Hollow (itch)
description:
Spookity Hollow is a ghastly third-person sandbox game created for young children (Ages 4+) which encourages curiosity and role-play.

Go on a ghastly adventure as Gilbert or create your own customized kitty. Choose from a wide variety of wearables and unlock new ones while exploring Spookity Hollow and meet all the other creatures that are on their own spooky adventure.

Gilbert and his friends are easy to control making traversing Spookity Hollow easier and more fun. The game can be played both single-player or local (splitscreen) co-op, working together to accomplish simple goals.

  • CHARACTER CUSTOMIZATION
    Customize your character to your own liking! Fur types, Hats, Glasses and moods are among the options to make your kitty look unique.

  • INTERACTIVE OBJECTS AND NPC'S
    You can find magic potions, meet the Cheep-Cheeps or fly around on a magical broom like a proper witch cat or collect all the pumpkins and meet the Pumpkin King himself. Keep an eye out for super special hats and glasses you can wear. There's a lot to do in Spookity Hollow!

  • COMPATIBLE WITH PLAY WITH GILBERT
    Spookity Hollow is compatible with the Play With Gilbert Remake. Customized kitties can be brought over from one game to the other and back.
